SettingsActivity ListDrinksActivity
disclaimer <--> Disclaimer Please remember that DrinkTracker is only an approximation of your blood alcohol content (BAC), and not a substitute for a breathalyser examination. GlassByte is in no way responsible for any actions carried out under intoxication. Please drive responsibly and stay safe under the influence of alcohol. By using this app, you agree to abide by this forewarning. I agree I disagree
dialog warnings <--> Sober. Mildly relaxed and no loss of coordination. Slight impairment, lowered inhibitions, lowered caution, exaggeration of behaviour. Mild impairment of balance, speech, vision and reaction time. Significant impairment of coordination, loss of judgement, and feeling of euphoria. Lack of physical control, loss of balance, and blurring of vision. Reduced euphoria and increased dysphoria. Severe impairment of perception and judgement. Intensifying of dysphoria, increase in nausea, appears "more sloppy". Dazed, confusion, disorientation. May not feel pain if injured. Nausea and vomiting experienced around this level. Gag reflex may be impaired. Blackouts are more likely from this point. Severe impairment of all sensory, physical and mental functions. Increased risk of asphyxiation by vomiting and injury. Drunken stupor - you have little comprehension of where you are. Passing out and difficulty to be awoken is very likely. Equivalent to surgical level anaesthesia. Onset of coma and possible death due to respiratory arrest.
unit warnings <--> Total units drunk this week: units Below recommended weekly limit. Excessive drinking!
detailed stats <--> Detailed Statistics Average strength of drinks: Average volume of drinks: Alcohol calories this week: Maximum BAC achieved: calories
miscellaneous <--> Current\nBAC:\n Current BAC level: PRESET DRINKS CUSTOM DRINKS Time BAC
presets <--> Drink added successfully Please choose a drink: Set Percentage Set Volume Drink
Settings <--> Language Options Irish Language Option Select this option if you wish to use Irish Gaelic as a language option More from Glassbyte Visit us at our website! Ostrze≈ºenie! ml oz DrinkTracker Plugins Used App Intro\nby PaoloRotolo\n\nFloatingActionButton\nby Clans\n\nJoda-Time-Android\nby dlew\n\nHelloCharts for Android\nby lecho You\'re enroute to getting drunk, maybe take it easy if you\'re feeling a bit intoxicated. You\'ve reached quite a drunk stage, watch yourself and make sure you don\'t lose personal belongings. You\'re very drunk and should expect a bad hangover tomorrow morning. You\'re extremely drunk, drink any more and you\'re endangering yourself!
